components.description: A blue cube of ice. Can be used to talk about ice or cold temperatures in general. This emoji can also be used metaphorically to talk about something that is cool or chill.
components.title: Ice Cube

description: A blue cube of ice. Can be used to talk about ice or cold temperatures in general. This emoji can also be used metaphorically to talk about something that is cool or chill.
title: Ice Cube

version.description: Unicode 12.0 was released on March 5, 2019. Emojis that require new code points for release are listed on this page. See Emoji 12.0 for the full 2019 emoji list. More about this update.

apple_vendor_description: The ice emoji on Apple devices presents a crystal-clear, multifaceted shard with sharp yet rounded edges, capturing the essence of frozen water. Apple's masterful use of realistic lighting and subtle reflections creates a sense of depth and translucency, making it appear cool and refreshing. The subtle glossy sheen and smooth gradients on its surface suggest its solid, pristine nature, commonly used to represent cold temperatures, chilly drinks, or a situation that is 'cool' or even frozen in time.
